duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather, understand, and define business requirements with clients and end users.
Implement and architect solutions in Salesforce Communication Cloud based on client's needs.
Develop user stories and process flows to support the design and development of Salesforce solutions.
Collaborate with team members to design solutions that meet client's business requirements.
Configure user stories within Salesforce and test solutions with developers.
Participate in key meetings with clients including requirement sessions, system demos, and user training.
Translate user requirements into technical specifications for development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
